refnamediv.refpurpose: Rivendell List Log C Library Function

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: RD_ListLog is the function to use to list the log lines that are stored for a particular log file within the Rivendell Database.
This function lists the lines in a pre-existing Log File.

row.entry: Memory location to store logline information
Mandatory When NO User/Password Pair Provided.
User Agent Value put into HTTP request
memory location for number of records returned

refsect1.para: When successful function will return the number of records sent (numrecs) and rd_logline structure which is stored in the provided memory locations. The rd_logline structure has the following fields:

refsect2.title: RETURN VALUE
refsect2.para: On success, zero is returned. Using the provided parameters an rd_logline structure is returned and the number of records is returned.
If a server error occurs a -1 is returned. If a client error occurs a specific error number is returned.
